QueryDefinition.Query:
with careSite as ( SELECT distinct pracid as id FROM {sc}.Practice )
SELECT a.eventdate, ch.person_id as patid, a.staffid, (cast(ch.person_id as bigint) * 10000000000) + (cast(EXTRACT(YEAR from a.eventdate) as bigint) * 1000000) + (cast(EXTRACT(MONTH from a.eventdate) as bigint) * 10000) + (cast(EXTRACT(DAY from a.eventdate) as bigint) * 100) + coalesce(c.constype, 99) as visit_occurrence_id, cs.id as care_site_id, m.read_code, case when c.constype = 0 then 'Data Not Entered' when c.constype = 1 then 'Clinic' when c.constype = 2 then 'Night visit, Deputising service' when c.constype = 3 then 'Follow-up/routine visit' when c.constype = 4 then 'Night visit, Local rota' when c.constype = 5 then 'Mail from patient' when c.constype = 6 then 'Night visit , practice' when c.constype = 7 then 'Out of hours, Practice' when c.constype = 8 then 'Out of hours, Non Practice' when c.constype = 9 then 'Surgery consultation' when c.constype = 10 then 'Telephone call from a patient' when c.constype = 11 then 'Acute visit' when c.constype = 12 then 'Discharge details' when c.constype = 13 then 'Letter from Outpatients' when c.constype = 14 then 'Repeat Issue' when c.constype = 15 then 'Other' when c.constype = 16 then 'Results recording' when c.constype = 17 then 'Mail to patient' when c.constype = 18 then 'Emergency Consultation' when c.constype = 19 then 'Administration' when c.constype = 20 then 'Casualty Attendance' when c.constype = 21 then 'Telephone call to a patient' when c.constype = 22 then 'Third Party Consultation' when c.constype = 23 then 'Hospital Admission' when c.constype = 24 then 'Children''s Home Visit' when c.constype = 25 then 'Day Case Report' when c.constype = 26 then 'GOS18 Report' when c.constype = 27 then 'Home Visit' when c.constype = 28 then 'Hotel Visit' when c.constype = 29 then 'NHS Direct Report' when c.constype = 30 then 'Nursing Home Visit' when c.constype = 31 then 'Residential Home Visit' when c.constype = 32 then 'Twilight Visit' when c.constype = 33 then 'Triage' when c.constype = 34 then 'Walk-in Centre' when c.constype = 35 then 'Co-op Telephone advice' when c.constype = 36 then 'Co-op Surgery Consultation' when c.constype = 37 then 'Co-op Home Visit' when c.constype = 38 then 'Minor Injury Service' when c.constype = 39 then 'Medicine Management' when c.constype = 40 then 'Community Clinic' when c.constype = 41 then 'Community Nursing Note' when c.constype = 42 then 'Community Nursing Report' when c.constype = 43 then 'Data Transferred from other system' when c.constype = 44 then 'Health Authority Entry' when c.constype = 45 then 'Health Visitor Note' when c.constype = 46 then 'Health Visitor Report' when c.constype = 47 then 'Hospital Inpatient Report' when c.constype = 48 then 'Initial Post Discharge Review' when c.constype = 49 then 'Laboratory Request' when c.constype = 50 then 'Night Visit' when c.constype = 51 then 'Radiology Request' when c.constype = 52 then 'Radiology Result' when c.constype = 53 then 'Referral Letter' when c.constype = 54 then 'Social Services Report' when c.constype = 55 then 'Telephone Consultation' when c.constype = 56 then 'Template Entry' when c.constype = 57 then 'GP to GP communication transaction' when c.constype = 58 then 'Non-consultation medication data' when c.constype = 59 then 'Non-consultation data' when c.constype = 60 then 'ePharmacy message' when c.constype = 61 then 'Extended Hours' end as description, c.constype, ch.PartitionId FROM {sc}.Referral a JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND a.patid = ch.person_id LEFT JOIN {sc}.Medical m on (a.medcode = m.medcode) left join {sc}.consultation c on a.patid = c.patid and a.consid = c.consid left join careSite cs ON cs.id = cast(right(cast(a.patid as varchar(20)),5) as int) where a.eventdate is not NULL order by ch.PartitionId, ch.person_id
